io.spine.server.entity

Class RecordBasedRepository<I,E extends Entity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
      • io.spine.server.entity.RecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of IDs of entities
    E - the type of entities
    S - the type of entity state messages
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryView<I,E>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultRecordBasedRepository

    public abstract class RecordBasedRepository<I,E extends Entity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends Repository<I,E>
    The base class for repositories that store entities as records.

    Such a repository is backed by RecordStorage. Entity states are stored as EntityRecords.

        protected RecordStorage<I> createStorage(StorageFactory factory)
        Creates the storage using the passed factory.

        Implementations are responsible for properly calling the factory for creating the storage, which is compatible with the repository.

      • onRegistered

        @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper
public void onRegistered()
        The callback called by a BoundedContext during the registration of the repository.

        If entities managed by this repository are versionable, registers itself as a type supplier with the Stand of the parent parent BoundedContext.

        Caches Column definitions of the Entity class managed by this repository.

        Overrides:
        onRegistered in class Repository<I,E extends Entity<I,S>>

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<E> iterator(com.google.common.base.Predicate<E> filter)
        Description copied from class: Repository
        Returns an iterator over the entities exposed by the view that match the passed filter.

        The returned iterator does not support removal.

        Iteration through entities is performed by loading them one by one.

        Specified by:
        iterator in interface RepositoryView<I,E extends Entity<I,S>>
        Overrides:
        iterator in class Repository<I,E extends Entity<I,S>>
        Parameters:
        filter - the filtering predicate
        Returns:
        new iterator

      • findOrCreate

        @CheckReturnValue
protected E findOrCreate(I id)
        Loads an entity by the passed ID or creates a new one, if the entity was not found.

        An entity will be loaded despite its visibility. I.e. even if the entity is either archived or deleted, it is loaded and returned.

        The new entity is created if and only if there is no record with the corresponding ID.

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the entity to load
        Returns:
        the entity with the specified ID

      • loadAll

        @CheckReturnValue
public java.util.Iterator<E> loadAll(java.lang.Iterable<I> ids)
        Loads all the entities in this repository with IDs, contained within the passed ids values.

        Provides a convenience wrapper around multiple invocations of RecordBasedRepository.find(Object). Descendants may optimize the execution of this method, choosing the most suitable way for the particular storage engine used.

        The result only contains those entities which IDs are contained inside the passed ids. The resulting collection is always returned with no null values.

        The order of objects in the result is not guaranteed to be the same as the order of IDs passed as argument.

        In case IDs contain duplicates, the result may also contain duplicates, depending on particular implementation.

        NOTE: The storage must be assigned before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        ids - entity IDs to search for
        Returns:
        all the entities in this repository with the IDs matching the given Iterable

      • loadAll

        @CheckReturnValue
public java.util.Iterator<E> loadAll(java.lang.Iterable<I> ids,
                                                       com.google.protobuf.FieldMask fieldMask)
        Loads all the entities in this repository by their IDs and applies the FieldMask to each of them.

        Acts in the same way as RecordBasedRepository.loadAll(Iterable), with the FieldMask applied to the results.

        Field mask is applied according to FieldMask specs.

        NOTE: The storage must be assigned before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        ids - entity IDs to search for
        fieldMask - mask to apply on entities
        Returns:
        all the entities in this repository with the IDs contained in the given ids
        See Also:
        RecordBasedRepository.loadAll(Iterable)

      • loadAll

        @CheckReturnValue
public java.util.Iterator<E> loadAll()
        Loads all the entities in this repository.

        NOTE: The storage must be assigned before calling this method.

        Returns:
        all the entities in this repository
        See Also:
        RecordBasedRepository.loadAll(Iterable)

      • find

        @CheckReturnValue
public java.util.Iterator<E> find(io.spine.client.EntityFilters filters,
                                                    com.google.protobuf.FieldMask fieldMask)
        Finds all the entities passing the given filters and applies the given FieldMask to the results.

        Field mask is applied according to FieldMask specs.

        The field paths in the entity column field filters are specified to contain a single path member - the name of the entity column.

        The filtering process is delegated to the underlying RecordStorage.

        NOTE: The storage must be assigned before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        filters - entity filters
        fieldMask - mask to apply to the entities
        Returns:
        all the entities in this repository passed through the filters
        See Also:
        EntityQuery
